entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:15 a.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to snow and local blowing snow this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
